definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The flexible Red Knife allows officers to rehearse responses to edged weapon attacks.
sentences.chinese: 柔性红刀可训练警官模仿在锐器袭击时反应。

sentences.english: This is because connections are vulnerable to breaking due to the flexible screen.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为由于柔性荧光屏易碎致使连接脆弱。

sentences.english: A flexible display device can also be used with an electronic device.
sentences.chinese: 柔性显示装置还可以用于电子装置。

sentences.english: Applied to two pieces of flexible pipe single-side random angle structure.
sentences.chinese: 应用于两根柔性管组成单面随意角度结构。

sentences.english: Its fixture is designed with characteristic of flexibility, and its leak proof structure is smart as well.
sentences.chinese: 其夹具带有柔性化设计，防漏结构也较为巧妙。

sentences.english: Self-set grout is a flexible waterproof material used for anti-seepage wall.
sentences.chinese: 自凝灰浆是性能良好的柔性防渗墙材料。

sentences.english: However strategic flexibility ignores the environmental munificence and complexity that will influence the effect of strategic flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 战略柔性忽略了环境包容性和复杂性的影响。

sentences.english: The beam motion is divided into two parts: rigid rotation and flexible vibration.
sentences.chinese: 假设梁的运动由刚性回转与柔性振动两部分组成。

sentences.english: Both flexible whorl cover and stern with screw are placed in flexible sealing shell.
sentences.chinese: 柔性螺纹套和带有螺杆的阀杆均置于柔性密闭壳体中。

sentences.english: Both flexible whorl cover and stern with screw are placed in flexible sealing shell.
sentences.chinese: 柔性螺纹套和带有螺杆的阀杆均置于柔性密闭壳体中。

sentences.english: The cylindrical normal contact between a rotational flexible body and a fixed cylindrical groove was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究作旋转运动的柔性梁的线接触正碰撞问题。

sentences.english: Vortex-induced vibration is one of recurring aeroelastic dynamic responses of flexible structures.
sentences.chinese: 涡激振动是柔性结构易发生的气动弹性现象。

sentences.english: It resists tearing, flex-cut growth, creep and abrasion.
sentences.chinese: 它抗撕，柔性切割增长，蠕变和磨损。

sentences.english: The application of uniform design theory (UDT)in the optimization of mix proportion of the flexible materials is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了均匀设计理论在柔性材料配合比优选中的应用。

sentences.english: Applied to two pieces of flexible pipe guide surface structure of 90 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 应用于两根柔性管组成导面90度结构。

sentences.english: The rigid jointer is replaced by the flexible jointer in a revolving system.
sentences.chinese: 用柔性联接器代替旋转系统各转子之间的刚性联接。
